files.patch:
@@ -54,0 +54,1 @@
+          - riscv64
@@ -56,1 +57,0 @@
-            debian-arch: arm64
@@ -58,0 +58,4 @@
+            dist-arch: arm64
+            dist-name: bullseye
+            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            dist-components: 'main'
@@ -59,1 +63,0 @@
-            debian-arch: armhf
@@ -61,0 +64,4 @@
+            dist-arch: armhf
+            dist-name: bullseye
+            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            dist-components: 'main'
@@ -63,1 +70,0 @@
-            debian-arch: s390x
@@ -65,0 +71,4 @@
+            dist-arch: s390x
+            dist-name: bullseye
+            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            dist-components: 'main'
@@ -66,1 +76,0 @@
-            debian-arch: ppc64el
@@ -68,0 +77,10 @@
+            dist-arch: ppc64el
+            dist-name: bullseye
+            dist-repository: https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+            dist-components: 'main'
+          - target-cpu: riscv64
+            gnu-arch: riscv64
+            dist-arch: riscv64
+            dist-name: jammy
+            dist-repository: http://ports.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-ports
+            dist-components: 'main,universe'
@@ -105,1 +124,1 @@
-          key: sysroot-${{ matrix.debian-arch }}-${{ hashFiles('./.github/workflows/build-cross-compile.yml') }}
+          key: sysroot-${{ matrix.dist-arch }}-${{ hashFiles('./.github/workflows/build-cross-compile.yml') }}
@@ -114,1 +133,0 @@
-          --arch=${{ matrix.debian-arch }}
@@ -116,0 +134,2 @@
+          --arch=${{ matrix.dist-arch }}
+          --components=${{ matrix.dist-components }}
@@ -118,1 +138,1 @@
-          bullseye
+          ${{ matrix.dist-name }}
@@ -120,1 +140,1 @@
-          https://httpredir.debian.org/debian/
+          ${{ matrix.dist-repository }}
